lines.text: [Kevin checking the contents of 'his suit bag']
All right let's see what we've got... I don't care if it don't look good,just fit...
[noticing the 'GFH' initials on the suit]
GFH?
[he looks further and he found the brand tag]
Groverton Funeral Home? I'm dead... I'm *dead*...
[guests wondering what 'GFH' stands for at Kevin's suit]
What is that stand for?
My great-grandfather, General Francois Heimlich Manuever, World War 1 and 2
Good guy.
What does it stand for?
Gemstones Furs, and Haberdasheries.
[to 3rd guest]
Graduated, Full Honors, Oxford. I guess you wouldn't know about that.
I went to Harvard
Yeah, Harvard *Street*
[to a Priest]
Oh, It's a gospel group I was with, Godliness, Faithful and Honest
Ah, amen.

[to other guests]
Geeks For Hire,a temporary service. You'd fit it, you ought to call us. Gas From Humans... Girls From the Hood... G-strings For the Huge... Gotta Feed the Hungry... Girls Feeding Homies
It's that a joke?

[to a female guest]
Good, Fine and Healthy and baby, you're it. *BAM!* You know what I'm saying?
[female guest leaves Kevin]
[after stumbling on Jason's skateboard]
Jason, how many times have I told you to pick that damn thing up? A lot, I think. Probably several, maybe.
[Kevin's shipment of baseball cards come in]

The entire 1994 baseball season, know what I'm saying? I got Ken Griffey Jr. here, Barry Bonds, Jose Canseco. People spend big money for baseball cards, but if they get hurt, it's even worth more money! Say one of them's going to the car after the game, gets hit - pow! I don't wanna see it happen, but if it does, I'm getting paid!
Slap me five there, brother!
How about I just slap you?
WHERE'S THE DOUGH?
If you drive away, I'll be standing here pointing!

[hangs up phone]
Happy's not happy.
Who is he, then?
That looks good. Can I try some?
Sure. Go ahead.
[Kevin tries the dip and reacts in disgust]
Oh! What is that?
Puree of parsnip and crook-neck squash.
I thought it was nacho cheese.

[after the playground bullies have lost their clothes in a game of basketball, they are standing on the court in their underwear]
Hey, can we please have our clothes back?

[embarrassedly trying to cover his boxer shorts]
Maybe the best out of three?
